item.title: The Scene View
item.description: The Scene View # The Scene View, or Scene Window, is where we will spend the majority of our time in Unity. It allows us to see our scene, and edit and select objects. The scene View is most closely linked to the Hierarchy â€“ they are both ways to edit a scene, and the Game View. Read the page in the Unity Manual on the Scene View, the Scene View Control Bar, and Gizmos.
